lines:
time in those European country.

Am any sorry to say that 
I can not refend the money to You 
befor you leave this country, but 
ewald like to have you advice 
me, to whom shall I send the money 
i case my father pends it to me 
after you leave. Will you be kind | 
indugh to advise me what to do?

Now 9 must say goodbye 
to you, and send my best wishes 
to accompany you an what9 trust 
will be a pleasant Journey

Yours Mort Sincerely,

S. 6. Luk

Will you be kind | indugh to advise me what to do? Now 9 must say goodbye to you, and send my best wishes to accompany you an what9 trust will be a pleasant Journey Yours Mort Sincerely, S. 6. Luk

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter apologizing for not writing because of spending time in Engineering Camp, followed by a fall that caused a leg injury and hospitalization in Fort Wayne from July 30th to September 15th. He wishes Stearns an enjoyable year abroad. Luk cannot remit money owed prior to Stearns' trip and asks for advice.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
